name: Pitch For Profit (MERN Stack)
desc: Pitch for Profit is a web-based platform designed to connect entrepreneurs with potential investors. It enables startups to pitch their ideas.

name: Spotify (HTML-CSS)
desc: A responsive Spotify Clone built using HTML, CSS. It mimics core UI features of Spotify like music cards

name: LimeJungle (HTML-CSS)
desc: LimeJungle is a visually appealing website built using HTML and CSS. Modern layout design, and smooth UI styling.

name: News Latter 2 (HTML-CSS)
desc: NewsLatter2 is a clean and responsive newsletter page built using HTML and CSS, suitable for integration into any website footer or landing page.

name: News Latter 1 (HTML-CSS)
desc: NewsLatter1 is a stylish newsletter designed using HTML and CSS. perfect for use in email campaigns or landing pages.

name: Google Com. UI (HTML-CSS)
desc: Google-Components is a simple project that recreates core UI elements inspired by Google's design using HTML and CSS. It includes search bars.
